intro: Ourisia nana, commonly known as the dwarf ourisia, is a low-growing perennial plant native to the Arctic and alpine regions of the Northern Hemisphere. It thrives in nutrient-poor, well-drained soils and is adapted to cold climates with short growing seasons. Ourisia nana plays a role in stabilizing soil in its harsh environment and provides nectar for pollinators.
